channel.title: Tony and Jenny Stinson on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Tony and Jenny Stinson on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – March 3, 2019
item.description: Family Sunday in sanctuary, Tony let go, church in shock. Snow came, not near amount forecast, thankful. I took Ashley to Kroger on S. Walnut to sell cookies, at 434, only 16 away from next goal. Boys sledded. Ashley not 100% but did okay. Dillan had issues getting homework done.

item.title: Status Update – February 22, 2019
item.description: Friday, long week! About 70%, upper lip split while sleeping, nose bleeds off and on. Slow getting ready, took kids to school. Work seems like big hole. Left work on time, stopped at Stinson’s for Marriage Oneness DVD then picked up kids. Pizza, watched Hotel Transylvania 2, bed.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – January 14, 2019
item.description: Ashley: Did you learn anything at your Marriage Oneness Class? Dave: Yeah, we learned that kids take up all our time, and energy, and money. Ashley: I think you already knew that. Dave: Yes we did. Dwyane: Tony confirmed it for you? Dave: Yup!

item.title: Status Update – July 3, 2017
item.description: Took Dillan to Noah Stinson’s, they put together Legos, played racquetball. Lesa went to Walmart. Tony and Noah brought Dillan home. Cleaned/filled pool, went swimming with kids. Test drove Jeep, bought for $4000. Watched Batman Lego movie. Shot fireworks from Jessica and Anneta.
